Headline: Update: No trains between Ashland and the Loop
ShortDescription: Update: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Ashland and the Loop due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Ashland and the Loop due to signal problems.

As a result, trains are operating only between 54th/Cermak and Ashland at this time.

Passengers may use #20 Madison buses as an alternative to Green and Pink Line service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Southport. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Southport. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
